caption.title: WUE percentage changes.
caption.p: The percentage change in WUE between the future (2056–2085) and baseline (1971–2000) periods for the CTL run for CESM ( a), GFDL ( b), echam6 ( c) and the IPSL ( d) models. WUE is calculated from GPP and evapotranspiration data. GPP data for IPSL are from the RCP8.5 scenario which the CTL run is based.
